API Reference¶

Geometry Modules¶

geometry.beam module¶

class geometry.beam.Beam(base_plane, dx, dy, dz)¶

Beam class containing its size and connecting dowels

add_dowel(dowel)¶

add a dowel to this beam

Parameters:dowel – the new dowel to be added
remove_duplicates_in_dowel_list()¶

resolve dowel duplication

brep_representation()¶

make a brep of this beam with holes

Returns:brep object of this beam
get_baseline()¶

get a line along with z-axis

Returns:line object of this beam
transform_instance_to_frame(target_frame=None)¶

in-place transform

Parameters:target_frame – target frame to transform according to this base_plane
transform_instance_from_frame_to_frame(source_frame, target_frame=None)¶

in-place transform

Parameters:
  • source_frame – source_frame frame to transform
  • target_frame – target frame to be transformed
static get_strucutured_data(beams)¶

get a data tree of lines with the actual length of each dowel

Parameters:beams – beams to be structured
Returns:DataTree

geometry.dowel module¶

Basic classes for MAS-DFAB 2018-19 T2 GKR Project

class geometry.dowel.Dowel(base_plane=None, line=None, dowel_radius=1.0, hole_radius=1.2)¶

Dowel class with connected beams

remove_duplicates_in_beam_list()¶

resolve beam duplication

get_plane()¶

get the plane on this dowel

Returns:rg.Vector3d
get_calculated_line()¶

get the line with the actual length

Returns:rg.Line
brep_representation()¶

make a brep of this dowel (for now with pseudo end points)

Returns:cylinder object of this dowel
get_line()¶

get a line object of this dowel

Returns:line object
get_outer_pipe()¶

get a cylinder drilled

Returns:cylinder object
get_inner_pipe()¶

get a cylinder of dowel

Returns:cylinder object

geometry.hole module¶

Basic classes for MAS-DFAB 2018-19 T2 GKR Project

class geometry.hole.Hole(gripping_plane=None, top_plane=None, bottom_plane=None, middle_plane=None, beam_brep=None)¶

Stores the planes for the drilling process.

static create_holes(beam, safe_buffer=2.0)¶

instanciates the holes in the beam

Parameters:
  • beam – beam plane to be drilled
  • safe_buffer – buffer length to drill for each side of the beam
Returns:

[Hole]
static get_tool_planes_as_tree(beams, target_plane, safe_buffer=5.0, safe_plane_diff=100)¶

get planes for its fabrication as a data tree

Parameters:
  • beams – beams to be fdrilled
  • target_plane – the plane where a drill locates
  • safe_buffer – the buffer distance from the very edges of the beam
Returns:

tuple of (a data tree of safes, a data tree of top planes, a data tree of bottom planes, a data tree of beam breps)
orient_to_drilling_station(target_frame)¶

orient a bottom plane to a given frame

Parameters:target_frame – the plane to be oriented
get_tool_planes(safe_plane_diff=100)¶

get planes to be sent to the robotic arm

Parameters:safe_plane_diff – offset for the safe plane
Returns:(safe plane, top plane, bottom plane)
